Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: How to specify exclusion list for 
     heritrix ?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=284768837

Hi,

you could also use the

  NotMatchesRegExpDecideRule

in your rule chain. Thus, you can avoid having to deal with special
surts-files. The RegEx can look very simple, like e.g.  (not tested!)

  ^(www\.)?mydomain.com/job.*\.html$

This would reject Urls like "www.mydomain/jobprofile.html" and
"mydomain.com/jobfoobar.html"

Max

> Hi
>
>     Thanks for replying. But I am not getting the point you want to
> tell. Please tell me specifically that what entry I have to made and
> where. Please tell me , in case of exclusion, how order.xml and
> seeds.txt files will look like.
>
>   And I want to show you what I did.
>
